title: Where can I find photographs to use as basis for art painting? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can use photos that are beyond the copyright protection. So, in other words, vintage photos. You can use photos for your paintings only if you get permission from the photographer and/or pay a fee for use. All photography is copyright protected.

Depends on what you intend to paint. There are many sites on the internet that have outstanding photos that include permission to reproduce. Also I use my own photos which i WiFi to my studio TV. I also use old calendar pictures. Artu.
